snippet: Toyota Motor reported a 5 percent jump in quarterly profit Tuesday, outpacing expectations as vehicle sales grew in North America and Europe, offsetting a drop in Japan.
abstract: Toyota Motor reports 5 percent rise in quarterly profit, outpacing expectations with record 587.77 billion yen ($5.7 billion).
lead_paragraph: Toyota Motor reported a 5 percent jump in quarterly profit Tuesday, outpacing expectations as vehicle sales grew in North America and Europe, offsetting a drop in Japan.

headline.main: Toyota Beats Expectations With Sales Growth
headline.print_headline: Toyota Beats Expectations With Sales Growth

keywords.value: Lexus Division of Toyota Motor Corp
